name: Massive Attack
text: Ha... I see... You have your own army." -Tony Hinder 2[per_hero]. When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to the Tony Stark Player. [amplify] [star]Boost: Put Massive Attack into play.

name: Tony Stark A.I.
text: Armored 2. Guard. Patrol. When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to the Tony Stark player. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Tony Stark A.I. activates, deal 1 damage to the Tony Stark player.

name: Get My Body Back
text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to the Tony Stark player, then take 1 damage.
